content: @Kevin Mayfield @Riki Merrick similar to the NHS childhood messaging we have defined some MessageHeader event codes for notifications in the Da Vinci Notification IG. I have a couple of questions re your code system 1. Do they have definitions. I could not find them. 2 source and 3 if they were created specific ally for the ig the methodology for creating them?
I think would be great to coalesce around a single set of codes if the use cases align.

Sorry had not subscribed and missed this.

This is a work in progress https://simplifier.net/NHSDigitalSpine/message-event
The prescription messages are in active development and pathology unsolicited-observations is likely to be added next.
